mapper.select: select td.*,u.phone,cd.coupon_id,c.name as couponName,c.money from trip_detail td left join users u on u.id = td.user_id left join coupon_detail cd on cd.trip_id = td.id left join coupon c on c.id=cd.coupon_id where 1=1 and td.state != 3 and td.p_id = #{tripId}

select td.*,d.name as driverName,d.phone as driverPhone,cd.coupon_id,c.name as couponName,c.money from trip_detail td left join users d on d.id = td.driver_id left join coupon_detail cd on cd.trip_id = td.id left join coupon c on c.id=cd.coupon_id where 1=1 and (td.state = 1 or td.state = 5) and td.user_id = #{params.passengerId} and to_days(td.create_time) = to_days(now());
select td.*,u.phone,u.name from trip_detail td left join users u on u.id = td.driver_id where 1=1 and td.id = #{id}
